start.text: Please stay peaceful in Jademouth. We like it quiet.~ If you have any questions, I'm the one to ask.~ Moon and sun.~ Can I help you?
start.choice: You don't look much like a warden.
I can feel your psyche. Do you have trouble with Seekers?
I'm looking to trade. Who can I talk to?

node.text: This is Jademouth. We are a mining village, struck out from the marl. Jade is our livelihood.

node.choice: Is there a reason for that?

node.text: Don't you know? Cats hunt birds.

Atacama is from the Consortium and xe can help you with vittle and supplies. Fizz has food and spices. There's also Bright. Other than that, you could talk with some of the miners directly if you're here for gemstones.

Fizz is a chef. They like to make food for the miners, but I'm sure they would invite you to have some of their gravy too. Don't be put off by their mannerisms; they are very good at what they do and they can provide you with ingredients if you're a cook yourself.
Atacama is a fractus plant. Xe handles most of our trade with outsiders like yourself. You can find xem just inside on your right. Look for the glowsphere.

{{w|*Cat's expression is unreadable underneath =pronouns.possessive= veil, but you feel telepathic waves of... is it disdain? Pity? Regret?*}}
Bright does a lot of things. She calls herself our tinker.
node.choice: You don't seem to think very highly of her.

node.text:
{{w|*You feel telepathic waves of conflicting emotions.*}}
Bright's our tinker.

node.choice: You'll work it out. Live and drink.

node.text: We do not. We decide things together in Jademouth.
